page.title: 18COST OF FOOD 1985, HIGH HAM
page.content: Jonathan is 10 years old.We looked at the food he ate in a typical day and worked out how much it cost to feed a boy in 1985,the food being bought from a supermarket in Street. For breakfast Jonathan ate cereal and milk, followed by toast and marmalade. He drank grapefruit juice. Breakfast cost 39.5p At 11.00am Jonathan ate a packet of crisps costing 12p. He had a school lunch consisting of salad and quiche, followed by rice pudding. He paid 69p for this meal cooked in High Ham Primary School kitchen, but the actual cost was 81p. He ate 3 biscuits after school, and for supper he had chicken curry with rice, followed by a pineapple yoghurt. This cost Â£1.06. Before going to bed Jonathan had a glass of squash and some biscuits. The total cost of one day's food was Â£2.64.
